description.db:para: This table is used by the Quality Routing module to store information about the thresholds for warnings and disabling destinations. A profile is associated with a drouting rule. More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;qrouting.html.

column.name: id
column.description: Table primary key

column.name: profile_name
column.description: The name of the profile

column.name: warn_threshold_asr
column.description: The warning threshold for answer seizure ratio

column.name: warn_threshold_ccr
column.description: The warning threshold for call completion ratio

column.name: warn_threshold_pdd
column.description: The warning threshold for post dial delay

column.name: warn_threshold_ast
column.description: The warning threshold for average setup time

column.name: warn_threshold_acd
column.description: The warning threshold for average call duration

column.name: crit_threshold_asr
column.description: The critical threshold for answer seizure ratio

column.name: crit_threshold_ccr
column.description: The critical threshold for call completion ratio

column.name: crit_threshold_pdd
column.description: The critical threshold for post dial delay

column.name: crit_threshold_ast
column.description: The critical threshold for average setup time

column.name: crit_threshold_acd
column.description: The critical threshold for average call duration

column.name: warn_penalty_asr
column.description: Traffic volume reduction when ASR falls below warn limit

column.name: warn_penalty_ccr
column.description: Traffic volume reduction when CCR falls below warn limit

column.name: warn_penalty_pdd
column.description: Traffic volume reduction when PDD falls below warn limit

column.name: warn_penalty_ast
column.description: Traffic volume reduction when AST falls below warn limit

column.name: warn_penalty_acd
column.description: Traffic volume reduction when ACD falls below warn limit

column.name: crit_penalty_asr
column.description: Traffic volume reduction when ASR falls below crit limit

column.name: crit_penalty_ccr
column.description: Traffic volume reduction when CCR falls below crit limit

column.name: crit_penalty_pdd
column.description: Traffic volume reduction when PDD falls below crit limit

column.name: crit_penalty_ast
column.description: Traffic volume reduction when AST falls below crit limit

column.name: crit_penalty_acd
column.description: Traffic volume reduction when ACD falls below crit limit
